# GK Prescreen - Copilot Custom Instructions

This workspace contains a React + Next.js + Node.js application for customer onboarding.

## Project Guidelines

- TypeScript is used throughout the project
- Follow ESLint and Prettier formatting rules
- Use functional components with React hooks
- Keep components in `src/components/`
- Place pages in `src/pages/`
- Utility functions go in `src/lib/`

## Key Technologies

- Next.js 6.1.1
- React 16.8.6
- TypeScript 4.8.4
- Redux/MobX for state management
- Material-UI for components

## Common Commands

- `npm run dev` - Development server
- `npm run build` - Production build
- `npm run lint` - Code linting
- `npm test` - Run tests with coverage
